spec_data.Name: libcgroup-devel
spec_data.Description:
It provides API to create/delete and modify cgroup nodes. It will also in the
future allow creation of persistent configuration for control groups and
provide scripts to manage that configuration.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 06:40:18 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development libraries to develop applications that utilize control groups
